name: ice-burn
flavor_text: On the second turn, an ultracold, freezing wind surrounds the target. This may leave the target with a burn.
effect_text_extend: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 30% chance to burn the target.  User charges for one turn before attacking.
effect_text_simple: Requires a turn to charge before attacking.  Has a 30% chance to burn the target.
